DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate prevalence heavy menstrual bleeding ( HMB ) females age 18 50 year old living Bejing .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Heavy Menstrual Bleeding Female Population Living Beijing
DOC.detailed_description: This study observational , cross-sectional study . A representative sample 2800 eligible woman different occupation farmer , service provider , worker , professional specialist , student civil servant recruit . A cluster sample method probability proportional distribution occupation woman Beijing use . Demographic data collect questionnaire . Menstrual bleeding evaluate Pictorial Blood loss Assessment Chart ( PBAC ) . According international definition HMB , PBAC score 100 consider HMB .
DOC.criteria: Females age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) Stay Beijing 6 month Signed ICF obtain Not achieve menarche With last menstruation one year ago Experienced amenorrhea , currently take hormone therapy induce menstruation Had undergone hysterectomy Currently breastfeed baby Being pregnant
